clinical_history: Follow-up imaging for known pulmonary nodule.
findings: Thoracic aortic aneurysm measuring 20 mm in diameter.
Emphysematous changes with hyperlucency in left lower lobe.
Small pneumothorax on the left lower lobe side.
Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of left lower lobe.
Patchy ground-glass opacities noted in left lower lobe.
Focal consolidation in left lower lobe with air bronchogram.
